Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] If "Raigeki Break" is activated, targeting "T.G. Cyber Magician" and "TG1-EM1" is chained, targeting "T.G. Cyber Magician" and "Scrap Dragon", "T.G. Cyber Magician" will still be destroyed when "Raigeki Break" resolves. When you target a card, you are targeting the card itself, not the zone it's in.

PSCT.Edison: ① Discard 1 card, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
